ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return if entity.Fields["TIPO"] == 1 or entity.Fields["TIPO"] == 3: widget.View.Commands["CMD_SELECIONAR_PARCELAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_EXCLUIR_PARCELAS"].Visible = False
